subject: Hockey, Ice
Monuments and Memorials (Structures)
Art
Sculpture
lead_paragraph: A California artist who grew up attending Devils games with his father is producing a sculpture of the team’s longtime goaltender that is to be installed at Prudential Center in February.
snippet: A California artist who grew up attending Devils games with his father is producing a sculpture of the team’s longtime goaltender that is to be installed at Prudential Center in February.
